name: Shoot 'Em Up (extreme tank 2)
description:
What's new in this version - 

New visual and sound effects added as well as recoil!

It's pretty straightforward, as instructions can be found inside the game. Just some clarifications about the icons of the statistics: - Aim: number of eliminations - Clock: Time alive - Gunshot: How many times enemies were hit - Heart: Total health (including the 100 hp when starting a game) - The one that changes every 0.5 seconds: Number of power-ups collected - Trophy: Score
